displayProperties.description: This activity is currently Focused. Your score will contribute to your class's standing in the fight for glory in the Focus Activity Event.
displayProperties.name: Focused Activity

displayProperties.description:
To win, rack up points by defeating your opponents. You gain more points and a boost of energy at each final blow while on a streak of 2 or more.

Streak: The number of opponents you defeat in a single life. Streaks are broken into 2 tiers called Surging and Primed that award you increasingly more points and energy at each final blow. But beware: once you become Primed, you need to keep quickly defeating your opponents or you'll erupt!

The Hunt: This activates for your team when you or your teammate is Primed by reaching a streak of 5 or more. At the start of The Hunt, the whole team gets a boost of energy.  It ends when your team has no more players Primed.
displayProperties.name: Iron Banner: Eruption

displayProperties.description:
Round 1: Hive
Round 2: Fallen
Final Round: Valus Ta'aurc

displayProperties.description:
Stoke the bonfire!

Ignition Carriers: Glowing combatants that drop Igniters when defeated.

Igniters: Objects that can be picked up and thrown into the bonfire to stoke the flames.

Bonfire: Stoke the bonfire with Igniters to make the flames grow. The more the bonfire is stoked, the more Silver Leaves can be transformed into Silver Ash. Equipping Sunlit armor and transforming Silver Leaves increases rewards at the end of the activity.

Taken Interference: Taken will disrupt the bonfire throughout the activity. Defeat them to reignite the bonfire!
displayProperties.name: Bonfire Bash Rules

displayProperties.description:
Defend and repair the ADU against waves of combatants. If the ADU is destroyed, the activity will end.

Scraps: Activity currency used to purchase and upgrade defenses at the start of every set and after waves 3 and 6.

Rewards: Received after defeating the boss wave.

Bonus Objectives: These reward resources and armaments.
displayProperties.name: Onslaught Rules

displayProperties.description:
To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the opposing team to exhaust their revives.

Revives: Both teams are allocated a limited pool of revives. If a team runs out of their revives, they can no longer respawn.

displayProperties.description:
This playlist contains Collision and Survival. When you launch, it will randomly select one of the modes for you to play.

Collision: To win, score more points than your opponents by capturing and controlling the zone. There will be one zone active at a time. Defeating your opponents does not directly grant points.

Survival: To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the opposing team to exhaust their revives.

displayProperties.description:
Capture and control active zones to score points. There are multiple zone locations, but only one active at a time. 

The team with the most points at the end of the match wins! Defeating your opponents does not grant points. 

Zones: Score +1 point when your team captures an active zone. Score +1 point for each time interval your team controls that zone. Captured zones will deactivate after a set amount of time and a new zone will activate elsewhere on the map.

displayProperties.description:
To win, your team must detonate or defuse charges. Defeating the entire opposing team and being the last Guardian(s) standing will also grant victory.

Attackers: Arm the charge at one of two sites, and guard it until it detonates. Eliminating the defending team will result in winning a round.

Defenders (Arming Phase): Prevent the attacking team from arming any charges until the round ends. Eliminating the attacking team will result in winning a round. 

Defenders (Defusing Phase): Defuse the armed charge. Eliminating the attacking team will not end the round.
displayProperties.name: Countdown Rules

displayProperties.description:
Capture the zones and defeat your opponents for points. The team with the most points wins.

Zone Advantage: The state when your team owns 2 zones. Your team gains +2 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.

Power Play: The state when your team owns all 3 zones. Your team gains +3 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.

Capture Participant: You gain an additional +1 point for each player that participated in the zone capture.

displayProperties.description:
Capture the zones and defeat your opponents for points. The team with the most points wins. This is a faster version of Control.

Momentum: You can capture zones faster. Weapon damage is significantly increased. Abilities and Supers regenerate when you defeat an opponent. Passive regeneration is significantly decreased. 

Zone Advantage: The state when your team owns 2 zones. Your team gains +2 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.

Power Play: The state when your team owns all 3 zones. Your team gains +3 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.
displayProperties.name: Momentum Control Rules

displayProperties.description:
To win, be the first team to summon and defeat your Primeval. 

Motes: Defeated foes will drop Motes you can pick up. Watch out! If you die, you'll lose any Motes you're holding. 

Bank: Deposit Motes you're holding in the bank. Bank enough Motes, and you'll summon a Primeval. 

Blockers: Bank enough Motes at once to summon Blockers that lock the opposing team's bank. 

Invasions: As your team banks Motes, an invasion portal will open, allowing you to enter the opposing team's area. Take them out to make them drop their Motes!
displayProperties.name: Gambit Rules

displayProperties.description:
To win, your team must detonate or defuse both charges.

Attackers: Arm the charge at one of two sites and guard it until it detonates. 

Defenders (Arming Phase): Prevent the attacking team from arming any charges until the round ends.  

Defenders (Defusing Phase): Defuse the armed charge.

Respawns Enabled: Defeated Guardians will respawn after a short time.

displayProperties.description:
This playlist contains Control and Clash. When you launch, it will randomly select one of the modes for you to play.

Control: Capture the zones and defeat your opponents for points. The more zones you control, the more points you get for each opponent defeated. The team with the most points wins!

Clash: To win, defeat your opponents to score more points than them!
displayProperties.name: Quickplay 6v6 Rules

displayProperties.description: {var:2189146210}% bonus to outgoing Void damage.
displayProperties.name: Void Surge

displayProperties.description: Defeated Guardians will respawn after a short time.

displayProperties.description:
To win, defeat your opponents, collect their crests, and deposit them at Cabal beacons.

Cabal Beacons: Beacons appear at various locations on the map, two at a time. They have limited duration before they switch to another position. Collect crests and deposit them at beacons for points.

The Hunt: Activates when the score threshold is met. This is a limited, special state when Caiatl sends a high-value beacon protected with turrets. The high-value beacon awards a bonus score for each crest deposited.
displayProperties.name: Iron Banner: Tribute

displayProperties.description: You will face [Disruption] Overload Champions.
displayProperties.name: Champion Foes

displayProperties.description:
To win, defeat your opponents to score more points than them! Every player is equipped with a Scorch Cannon.

Scorch Cannon: A heavy-impact weapon borrowed from the Eliksni. Shots can detonate on impact or can be charged by holding and releasing the actuator for a larger explosion.
displayProperties.name: Team Scorched Rules

displayProperties.description: Players do not respawn with Special ammo.
displayProperties.name: Special Ammo Rules (Alpha)

displayProperties.description:
Depositing data will award one of the following buffs:
• Chance to create Threadlings on Strand damage
• Chance to apply Suppressed on Void damage
• Chance to gain grenade energy on combatant final blows
displayProperties.name: Data Buffs

displayProperties.description: {var:4005007457}% increase to incoming Solar damage.

To win, score more points than your opponent by capturing and controlling zones.

Zones: Score points for each zone your team controls.
displayProperties.name: Zone Control Rules

displayProperties.description:
To win, score more points that your opponent by capturing and defending the zones. The Hunt activates twice per match.

Zones: Gain 2 points for each zone your team controls at each time interval.

Zone Advantage: The state when your team controls 2 zones. Your team gains 4 points at each time interval.

Power Play: The state when your team controls all 3 zones. Your team gains 6 points at each time interval.

The Hunt: Occurs twice per match. Caiatl sends a high-value zone via Drop Pod. This zone is quick to capture and awards a large number of points over a shorter period of time.
displayProperties.name: Iron Banner: Fortress

displayProperties.description: Power Level: All combatants in this activity will be at least {var:3112783658} points over your current Power level.
displayProperties.name: Exotic Modifiers

displayProperties.description:
When you and your ally are reunited, your weapon handling and reload speed are greatly increased, and you gain increased flinch resistance.

When you and your ally are drifting apart, your sprint and slide abilities are enhanced.
displayProperties.name: Doubles Rules

displayProperties.description: When the timer reaches zero, the fireteam will be returned to orbit.
displayProperties.name: Mission Is Timed

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.name: Hands Off

displayProperties.description: Arc damage increases slightly from all sources.
displayProperties.name: Arc Singe

displayProperties.description:
You will face [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Visit the Character or Mod Customization screen to view your active anti-Champion perks.
displayProperties.name: Champion Foes

displayProperties.description:
To win, score more points than your opponent by collecting the Spark and igniting your opponent's Rift.

Spark: Spawns in the center of the map at the beginning of the match and after a team scores. Drops at the Spark Runner's location upon death. 

Rift: Each team has a Rift on their side of the map. Carry the Spark into your opponent's Rift to score. Defend your Rift from opposing Spark Runners.
displayProperties.name: Rift Rules

displayProperties.description:
Weapon overcharges from the Seasonal Artifact are active in this activity.

Kinetic weapons do increased damage when your Super element matches an active surge.
displayProperties.name: Overcharged Weapons

displayProperties.description: When defeated, Psions spawn Void grenades at their feet.
displayProperties.name: Pestilence

displayProperties.description: Initial Exotic drop rate boosts: {var:2864503325}
displayProperties.name: Boosts Gained

displayProperties.description: Limited fireteam revives. Gain additional revives by defeating Champions.
displayProperties.name: Limited Revives

displayProperties.description: When close to a fireteam member, gain increased Recovery and Super regeneration.
displayProperties.name: Firebound

displayProperties.description:
Score points by defeating your opponents with a relic.

Relics: Mysterious weapons that hold immense power. Defeat your opponents with a relic to score points for your team.

Relic Depot: Each depot can equip you with one of the following relics: Aegis Shield, Synaptic Spear, Solar Scythe.

Relic Energy: Players without an equipped relic must earn energy to gain access to the Relic Depot. Relic energy can be built up by your own actions, your team's actions, and even the opponent's actions throughout the match.
displayProperties.name: Relic Rules

displayProperties.description:
To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the entire opposing team or capturing the zone.

Dominion: A capture zone appears at the start of each round. Win the round by capturing the zone.

Elimination: Wins can also be achieved by defeating the opposing team.

Revives: Teammate revives are enabled.
displayProperties.name: Dominion Rules

displayProperties.description: If your fireteam falls in a Restricted Zone, everyone is returned to orbit.
displayProperties.name: Extinguish

displayProperties.description:
Depositing data will award one of the following buffs:
• Chance to spawn an Orb of Power on combatant final blows
• Chance to Jolt on Arc Damage
• Chance to gain melee energy on combatant final blows
displayProperties.name: Data Buffs
